## EthersLiquity.getHALALStake() method

Get the current state of an HALAL Stake.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getHALALStake(address?: string, overrides?: EthersCallOverrides): Promise<HALALStake>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | Address that owns the HALAL Stake. |
